# SpatialAudioExperiences.AnchoringStrategy

**Enumeration**

The center of a head-tracked spatial experience.

## Declaration

```swift
enum AnchoringStrategy
```

## Overview

For mono sounds, this defines the sound’s single location. For multi-channel sounds this defines the position of the channel layout’s front with all channels placed around the user relative to that front.

## Enumeration Cases

- **SpatialAudioExperiences.AnchoringStrategy.automatic**: A system-defined anchoring strategy.
- **SpatialAudioExperiences.AnchoringStrategy.front**: Anchor to the front of the user’s space.
- **SpatialAudioExperiences.AnchoringStrategy.scene(identifier:)**: Anchor to the visual center of a particular UIScene.

## Conforms To

- Decodable
- Encodable
- Equatable
- Hashable
- Sendable
- SendableMetatype
